invocations.description: Returns the distance between positions given or -1 if it's not located on the same floor.
invocations.exDescription: Will go to the label 'Trapped' if the distance between coordinates is more or equal to 10.

invocations.description: Returns the distance between positions given or -1 if it's not located on the same floor.
invocations.exDescription: Will go to the label 'Trapped' if the distance between coordinates is more or equal to 10.

invocations.description: Returns the distance between positions given or -1 if it's not located on the same floor.
invocations.ex:
if getdistancebetween({x = $posx, y = $posy, z = $posz}, {x = 33333, y = 44444, z = 7}) >= 10 then
	gotolabel('Trapped')
end
invocations.exDescription: Will go to the label 'Trapped' if the distance between coordinates is more or equal to 10.
